channel.title: 2020-11-14 SocialCG Meeting
channel.description:
[date=2020-11-14 time=11:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"]
There are a lot of topics to roll over from the last meeting:
* [Continuation of alsoKnownAs as an extension conversation](https://socialhub.activitypub.rocks/t/defining-alsoknownas/907) * [Federation Enhancement Proposals](https://socialhub.activitypub.rocks/t/fediverse-enhancement-proposal-fep/1059) (lead by @pukkamustard) * Use of rel links and ActivityPub (lead by @sl007) * Making [Hashtag an extension](https://socialhub.activitypub.rocks/t/topics-and-services-we-can-subscribe-to/995/4)
